    Extract locus

    Source: R/extract-tools.R
    extract_locus.Rd

    Return locus information from GenBank record

    Usage

    extract_locus(record)

    Arguments

    record

    GenBank record in text format, character

    Value

    named character vector

    Details

    If element is not found, '' returned.

    See also
